briefTitle: Long-term Active Surveillance Study for Oral Contraceptives (LASS)
officialTitle: Long-term Active Surveillance Study for Oral Contraceptives (LASS)
conditions: Arterial Thromboembolism, Venous Thromboembolism, Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women who are prescribed an oral contraceptive and who are new users (first-ever users, switchers or restarters) of the formulation

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women who do not consent to participate in the study
